data_name: General fear of crime (walking alone in the neighborhood)
indicator_definition: This indicator measures the level of fear when walking alone in the neighborhood. Respondents were asked a five-point scale question: “Do I feel fear when walking alone in my neighborhood?”(Answers included: Never, Seldom, Neutral, Often, and Always)
